required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of TISSEEL Lyo Compared to Manual Compression as an Adjunct to Haemostasis
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised Controlled Multicenter Single-blinded Phase III Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of TISSEEL Lyo Compared to Manual Compression as an Adjunct to Haemostasis During Vascular Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the efficacy of TISSEEL Lyo for haemostasis in patients receiving peripheral vascular prosthetic expanded polytetrafluoroethylene (ePTFE) conduits, as compared to a control arm treated with manual compression with surgical gauze pads.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants achieving hemostasis at 4 minutes after treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 (4 minutes post-treatment to closure of surgical wound)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants achieving hemostasis at 6 minutes after treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 (6 minutes post-treatment to closure of surgical wound)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants achieving hemostasis at 10 minutes after treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 (10 minutes post-treatment to closure of surgical wound)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with intraoperative re-bleeding after hemostasis
Number of participants with postoperative re-bleeding after hemostasis
secondary_outcome.description: Performed on suture line. Requires surgical re-exploration.

clinical_study.condition: Adjunct to Hemostasis During Vascular Surgery

arm_group.description: Applied once intra-operatively to the study suture line using the DUPLOJECT Fibrin Sealant Preparation and Application System.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Manual compression with surgical gauze pads
arm_group.description: Treated once intraoperatively with manual compression using surgical gauze pads at the study suture line.

intervention.description: The dose to be applied is governed by variables including the type of surgical intervention, the size of the affected area and the mode of intended application, and the number of applications.. The guideline for sealing surfaces is one package of Tisseel Lyo 2 ml (i.e. 1 ml sealer protein solution plus 1 ml thrombin solution) is sufficient for a surface of at least 10 cm2.
intervention.other_name: Fibrin sealant Vapor Heated, Solvent/Detergent-Treated, with 500 IU/mL Thrombin

intervention.intervention_name: Manual compression with surgical gauze pads
intervention.arm_group_label: Manual compression with surgical gauze pads
